name: Hohenlohe Lab
tagline: Evolutionary Genomics at the University of Idaho
body:
### Welcome!
The Hohenlohe lab is part of the Department of [Biological Sciences](http://www.uidaho.edu/sci/biology) and the [Institute for Bioinformatics and Evolutionary Studies (IBEST)](http://www.ibest.uidaho.edu) at the University of Idaho.  Our research focuses on the genomic architecture of evolving populations.

Please visit the current lab [website](http://webpages.uidaho.edu/hohenlohe/index.html) for more information about our work, and check back as we continue to update this webpage.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
